title: Asian-style broccoli
directions: Heat the oil in a large wok until really hot. Add the garlic, chilli and ginger and fry for 30 seconds, stirring continuously
Add the purple-sprouting broccoli and stir-fry for one minute.
Add the oyster sauce, mix well and serve immediately.
ingredients: 500g purple sprouting broccoli, blanched and refreshed
1 red chilli, de-seeded and finely chopped
